name: Legends of Pixela
description:
PreAlpha of the 3D Platformer Legends of Pixela

There is still a lot of Work to do.

Developed by:

  • .+*Pixela*+. (PixelaGames2000)
  • BOOMnitz (Me)
  • PlumDaPlum
  • and More

Game Summary:

Follow the Adventures of Pixela and her partner and best friend Christo. Discover and dive deep into Pixelas Origins and where she came from.
Explore different worlds and platform your way to victory in this heavily story driven Game.
